data.message: My Father,  two sisters, brother,  brother-in-law and many cousins have or are serving in the military. Thanks to each of you and the many others who have served or are serving our country. No matter the color of your skin, the blood is always red. Much has flowed and much more will flow.  Let us unite as one.  Thank you Daddy, Shelley,  Tony, Karen and Kyle. To the many Cousins, thank you.

replies.message: Thanks for your compliment united we stand divided we fall so let us learn to stand together
